markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Feral Skull Swarm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1308)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Some skull swarms are crafted from the heads of feral and dangerous beasts. These can include predatory cats, bears, [dinosaurs](/Traits.aspx?ID=45), and the like, but just as often they're made from bulls, horses, apes, and other creatures that were gentler in life. In death, a feral skull swarm is bloodthirsty regardless of its origins, with a keen scent for living flesh. Even herbivore skulls diligently chew on the flesh of their swarm's victims.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 32

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 30

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 27
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/SkullSwarm_FeralSkullSwarm.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 12">[Feral Skull Swarm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1308)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Huge" />
<trait label="Mindless" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=108" />
<trait label="Swarm" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=239" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=160" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 244</row>

**Perception** +21; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +22, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +21

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +0

**Dex** +4

**Con** +7

**Int** -5

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +4
</row>

**Feral Trackers** A feral skull swarm gains a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks to [Seek](/Actions.aspx?ID=84) and to [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) checks to [Track](/Actions.aspx?ID=66), both against any creature that has taken damage from the swarm's Feral Gnaw within the previous 24 hours.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 32 

**Fort** +25 

**Ref** +22 

**Will** +19 

</row>

**HP** 160
([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42))

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), precision, [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Resistances**
bludgeoning 5, cold 10, electricity 10, fire 10, piercing 10, slashing 10

**Weaknesses**
area damage 10, [splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150) damage 10

**Boneshard Burst** When a feral skull swarm is reduced to 0 Hit Points, it erupts in an explosion of foul energy and bone fragments in a 30-foot burst, dealing 3d12 piercing damage and 2d12 negative damage (DC 32 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save).

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 40 feet

**Feral Gnaw** <actions string="Single Action" />  Each enemy in the swarm's space takes 2d6 bludgeoning, 2d6 piercing, and 2d6 slashing damage (DC 32 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). A creature that fails its saving throw also takes 1d10 [persistent bleed damage.](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29)

**Frightening Howl** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), [Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [Fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) The feral skull swarm emits a terrifying howl. Each creature within 60 feet must succeed at a DC 32 Will save or become [frightened 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) (frightened 3 and [fleeing](/Conditions.aspx?ID=17) for 1 round on a critical failure). Whether it succeeds or fails its save, a creature is temporarily immune to Frightening Howl for 24 hours.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-261" />
name: Feral Skull Swarm
resistance_markdown: bludgeoning 5, cold 10, electricity 10, fire 10, piercing 10, slashing 10
